content: pattern designed by ana luísa jeijeicro candyline summer headband pattern s m l customizable when the weather is good many people are on the loose to eat more sweets usually after winter regimes and to look great and healthy many people wear light dresses shorts skirts in summer this headband is made working a candy stitch pattern which really reminds me of candy wrapped in foil it s perfect to go with summer outfits you can style with bow tie in front hidden behind hair to see pattern better sideways and hair loose also it would be amazing to make the headband with variegated yarn or even sparkling yarn ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira skill intermediate yarn/yardage  sirdar hayfield bonus dk 100% acrylic 100g/3 5oz 280m 306yds 1 skein for medium size i used approx 50yds / 46m materials  any size #3 dk light medium weight yarn 40yds-80yds total  4mm crochet hook  tapestry needle  scissors  measuring tape  stitch markers optional gauge/gauge 2 = 4 row 1 repeat * see pic 1 *refer to diagram/chart for gauge to help gauge not very important the headband has a bit of stretch it s customizable to fit pic 1 abbreviations us terms uk terms mc magic_ring mc magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es st s stitch es double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet skip skip miss chain -
